website_summaries.verdict: This affordable trio of water birds – among other creative styles – offers a bit visual variety while keeping cups and cans afloat.
pros: Solo cups and short cans fit well and stay upright
Easy to inflate and won't lose air quickly
Nicely crafted with good attention to detail
Delivers eye-catching variety within a common theme
cons: Tipping with bottles and taller glasses can occur

customer_reviews.title: Mmn! Donuts!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a donut for my Homer Simpson costume. They worked great for that but would also be a good pool float for your cans of Duff Beer.
customer_reviews.author: Hell Bound

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for the price but doesn't float right
customer_reviews.text: So, they're really cute....but, I can't find a drink/cup/bottle that I can put in them and actually have it stay afloat without tipping over. Luckily my daughter things it's fun for her toys to have floaties that match hers. Hard to keep fully inflated while trying to push the plug back in-pinch the bottom of the plastic nozzle while putting the plug in with the other hand.
customer_reviews.author: McIlvaine

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Top Heavy
customer_reviews.text: I was using a small cup for a trial use and it is very unstable. The base is not large enough to provide a platform that prevents your drink from spilling into the water. I am going to try ballast i.e. lead, to see if that will help prevent the very cute swans from tipping over.
customer_reviews.author: Scots Irish

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my bachelorette party goody bags. These seem a lot more durable than the other cheaper ones I've gotten on Amazon. I'm glad I went with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service experience
customer_reviews.text: These floats did nit work very well, I believe that they had a fabrication fault, they wouldn't hold a full cup of beverage afloat for very long time.. I'm giving 3 stars because they looked cute and for the customer service experience. When I contacted customer service and explained the situation, they sent over a new different model (I opted for the two set shark) cost free. I already tested them and they work great. Really great, top notch customer service experience!
customer_reviews.author: Anca Grama

customer_reviews.title: You need this
customer_reviews.text: Friday Happy hour at the pool is a big deal in my neighborhood. Everyone is out grilling, drinking, and socializing until the sun goes down. Too many times great conversations get cut short because you needed to swim to the edge of the pool to grab your drink. Not any longer! These great looking drink floats will keep your beverage by your side the entire time. TIP: a 12 oz can in a coozie fit very well in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R

customer_reviews.title: So cute love them
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute love them prefect size for drinks and my kids love to stick there dolls in them lol
customer_reviews.author: Bobi

customer_reviews.title: Charming and works!
customer_reviews.text: Does just what it says it will - works with those ubiquitous red cups as well as pop top cans. We bought the Birds and can't use them without smiling!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Worked with My Elf on the Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Used these for my elf on the shelf... it sat in one and gave the kids donuts! Worked great! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Yulich

customer_reviews.title: but looks like they will
customer_reviews.text: All inflated properly. Have not tried to put drinks in them yet, but looks like they will. I was concerned they would congregate around the suction to basket, but no problem. The wind blows them all around, adding color and brightening up the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Didn't stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: Used them in a pond at a wedding. Guest wrote notes to couple getting married. Cute when inflated. They stayed inflated about 2 hours then developed holes.
customer_reviews.author: Noella  M Goodyear

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious!
customer_reviews.text: These are hilarious. I bought them for my friend and I to use at the beach. Easy to blow up and they Amazon delivered them a day early!! However, they don't hold large cups or top-heavy cups like the Yeti Rambler, but worked great for my drinks cans. They also make great toys for kiddos! I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Cute but may tip
customer_reviews.text: they don't hold beers well, tip over. Didn't want pool water in my drink, so didnt use red cups
customer_reviews.author: Story

customer_reviews.title: Not River Friendly, Barely Pool Friendly
customer_reviews.text: Like: Super fun and colorful. Easy to blow up. Stayed Inflated really well. Dislike: Would not stay upright in a river setting. Barely stayed upright when used with a can in CALM pool setting. Definitely tips over a lot with beer bottles inserted in them.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but don't work.
customer_reviews.text: These are cute, but unless you are using very short cups, they fall right over in the pool. Red solo cups are WAY too tall.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia R.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and on trend!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and very on trend with fruit and veggie floaties. They don't hold bottles of water but they hold red cups fairly well. Above all, they're adorable and decorative for the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie NYCTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Worked great in Vegas.
customer_reviews.text: We took these to Vegas and they worked great, only thing i wish they had was some way to attach to a raft or to your wrist. Basically, you're still holding your cup in the water, but i guess that's what the cup holders on rafts are for.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Wayne

customer_reviews.title: They're awesome looking, fit a can great but cups are ...
customer_reviews.text: They're awesome looking, fit a can great but cups are more difficult, if they're more than half full the birds want to flip over But they garnered lots of laughs and featured in nearly all of the vacation pics so overall worth the $10ish
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: NOPE
customer_reviews.text: These don't work well at all. They don't stand up while floating with drinks inside.
customer_reviews.author: Rose City Queen

customer_reviews.title: TIPS OVER
customer_reviews.text: These do NOT work. Any type of drink you put in it tips over, rendering them useless as pool cup holders. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke F.

customer_reviews.title: BAD QUALITY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with my order. I ordered 3 packages for my daughter pool party to share with her friends. All the black colored swans came deformed as shown in picture, they could not be used and looked very ugly. One pink came broken, it could not be inflated.
customer_reviews.author: M. DE MOYA

customer_reviews.title: When you need your beverage in the pool...these do the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome floating devices to hold your beverages. I had a set of these floating in a pool all summer long and had no issues with them staying inflated. I bought another set as a gift for friends who live in France. They love them!
customer_reviews.author: eARThRIOT

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: more of a novelty. Your cup needs to be about half full and don't even try to get them to float with a glass. They were fun but we only used them for like 20min.
customer_reviews.author: techracer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but tip over
customer_reviews.text: Not so great. Tips over when you put drink in.
customer_reviews.author: Cheermom99

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and fun to have floating around in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and fun to have floating around in the pool. Sadly though they get caught in the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are very cute but they don't hold up to actually floating.
customer_reviews.author: Lyons Family

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ok if you blow up can holders and your drink warm if you have a spa. Might be good for pools
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Super flimsy and couldn't hold anything heavy whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: Super flimsy and couldn't hold anything heavy whatsoever. Tipped over when tried a bottle of water, a can of soda/beer as well as a bottle of soda/beer. Literally can only hold a solo cup.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Freet

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute but don't put a beer bottle in them! They tend to tip. Unfortunately the swan wouldn't inflate from the get go but the others are ok.
customer_reviews.author: BridgetSoup

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Too small for a normal size cup. Had to send back, will look for ones that will work with my cup.
customer_reviews.author: Giabee

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a great fun item! Fast shipping of course!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda D.

customer_reviews.title: Swans Floating in your Pool
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Cups fit perfect in it. Great for the Pool.
customer_reviews.author: Funny Guy

customer_reviews.title: Crowd pleaser
customer_reviews.text: These things were a hit. I only gave them five stars because the drinks tip because of the bite mark and it has to be cups not bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: goofy, but worked!
customer_reviews.text: Hokey to look at, but stayed upright during son in law's cannonballs
customer_reviews.author: S. Anvik

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Found them at the store for $3. Also, they don't really hold anything up. Not the greatest purchase, but not the worst.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my best friend because they have a pool and enjoy their cocktails. She liked them and they are fun.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly E.

customer_reviews.title: You don't even need people to enjoy BigMouths.
customer_reviews.text: You can only put light cups in the BigMouths, but they worked great and were fun to view floating around the pool.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Perfect only works with cups tho lol we tried to put a beer bottle in it and it tipped
customer_reviews.author: lwreakhavok

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drink holder
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for a donut party. Great size for drinks and look great. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Adorable product! They do not work well with bottles
customer_reviews.text: Adorable product! They do not work well with bottles, which is primarily what I have at the lake where I use these. The bottles are too thin and top heavy to remain stable while floating. They work great with cans though!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzy

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Won't support a bottle, but cans and cups will follow you around the pool! Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Teeb

customer_reviews.title: These are great for the pool
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the pool! Super cute, unfortunately they do not work with taller cans but are fun for regular sized cans and float well. The black swan gets pretty hot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For Decorative Purposes Only IMHO
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable but they don't work. At all. Luckily the white wine had 0 bad effects on the hot tub's chemical balance!
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Queen

customer_reviews.title: Great for pool parties
customer_reviews.text: Quality product! They can be used for cans or cups. Bottles are too top heavy. Great for pool parties.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: These are super cute! I haven't actually used them in a ...
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute! I haven't actually used them in a pool yet but they seem decently made. :)
customer_reviews.author: Cvy Pham

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer. Looking to buy more of these.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are so cute to see them floating in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Missing Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this expecting to get all three items, I got two. This package did not include the watermelon floaty it was supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Kensy Brianna Ray

customer_reviews.title: Floats just fine. Now I just need to attach it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits a solo cup and a beer can. Floats just fine. Now I just need to attach it to a string so it doesn't float away from me in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: According to my daughter, these are 'amazing" and really fun. She as tested them successfully in both the ocean and in the lake.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lower

customer_reviews.title: Better decorations than drink holders.
customer_reviews.text: They're better decorations than drink holders. They tip over very easily, but they look cute floating around in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected- love them! I bought them as party gifts and they were a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great for the pool, fun giveaways for a party
customer_reviews.text: Great fun. Exactly what you expect from the product you're buying. They stay inflated well and are brightly colored. They were a hit as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They are cute but cannot hold any cups. Seriously they just tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: I cut the bottom out of mine and they work fine, but yanno
customer_reviews.text: For anything other than a red solo cup, these floaties don't work. Beer bottles are too small, yetis or similar drink containers tip over. I cut the bottom out of mine and they work fine, but yanno.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Fun. One came with a dead mosquito in it which was weird but it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not overly sturdy, but they did their jobs for the most ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for a bachelorette party and they worked well! Not overly sturdy, but they did their jobs for the most part and looked fun.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute floaties.. Drink sometimes tips over but definitely cute
customer_reviews.author: yve

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These do NOT hold cups up in the pool. Cute but worthless.

customer_reviews.title: Good for short glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are cute. Good for short glasses. Tips over if too tall a cup.
customer_reviews.author: B. Golan

customer_reviews.title: Great cup holder for the pool
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for red cups and some acrylic tumblers. You don't have to worry about spilling your drinks in the pool anymore.
customer_reviews.author: I Garcia

customer_reviews.title: They are smaller then what I was originally wanting. ...
customer_reviews.text: They are smaller then what I was originally wanting. But they look very cute in the our pool and smaller cups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but had a hole :/
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product but one of then had a hole when I got it. :/ Picture shows two packs.
customer_reviews.author: Lissy

customer_reviews.title: Loved them!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Bought them for my secret Santa. Big hit. Totally recommend them for some pool fun.
customer_reviews.author: bunny

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, and they were a hit at a ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Great quality, and they were a hit at a recent bachelor party.

customer_reviews.title: They are adorable and are well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I gave them as a gift for friends who just got a pool. They are adorable and are well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Totes awesome and fun to have. :) I love these and they were easy to blow up.

customer_reviews.title: fun!
customer_reviews.text: so cool, bought these for a girls beach weekend and everyone loved them.

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect, great quality drink holders
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect, great quality drink holders. Only thing I suggest is to make sure your cup is not too full.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Could only use plastic cups no bottles other that works fine

customer_reviews.title: Great pool accessory
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the flamingo set, they're perfect for the pool and exactly as pictures.
customer_reviews.author: JPO1210

customer_reviews.title: happy customer
customer_reviews.text: quick delivery, just as expected, easy to blow up, affordable, looks great... didn't use it in water. gave away as party gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Ax

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are such a big hit at parties with a pool. I bought mine and took them to the Blue Lagoon in Iceland and everyone loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Tay

customer_reviews.title: It's very fun to have your drink floating around in the pool ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for a few months now and they hold up surprisingly well. It's very fun to have your drink floating around in the pool with you.

customer_reviews.title: super fun for the summer
customer_reviews.text: use them in the pool with the matching large floats.

customer_reviews.title: Really cute drink holders for pool
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a pool party. They were easy to blow up and super cute!

customer_reviews.title: Everybody will want one
customer_reviews.text: Such a great buy!!! We use these all the time and even bring them to pool parties. People are jealous. We are awesome! Definitely get these

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift for friends with a pool
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a house warming gift, so unable to review further at the moment. Fun gift for friends with a pool.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute and fun. easy to blow up. Works as expected.

customer_reviews.title: If you have too much liquid in a red cup, it will flip over.
customer_reviews.text: The cups flip over if they have too much liquid. The inflatables are too small to keep up with full red cups.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, but doesn't hold much. A full water bottle or cup will tip it over.

customer_reviews.title: These are super cute and float well as long as there's not ...
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and float well as long as there's not too much splashing going on. I took them to Cabo and everyone in the hotel pool loved them and wanted to know where I got them!
customer_reviews.author: AmyS

customer_reviews.title: They don't float great, with a full drink
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for all the ladies on a couples trip. They don't float great, with a full drink, but they were fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A full cup tips over. I cut the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: A full cup tips over. I cut the bottom so the cup can sit lower in the ring and not tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: My family will be super pleased. There were no leaks and all seams ...
customer_reviews.text: Excited to take these on vacation! My family will be super pleased. There were no leaks and all seams were sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. Dittmann

customer_reviews.title: Cute but air leaks in some.
customer_reviews.text: Two off these items had air leaks and were unusable.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works well for short, heavy cups. Just make sure they fit snug.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A nice way to keep your drinks with you in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun - but these inflated slightly worse than the donut ones. Stull fun and worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Gargiulo

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit at hotel pool party!!!
customer_reviews.text: These were really great! They stayed a float for the most part and none of them had any air leaks, only thing that didn't work well was a full, long neck bottle of beer. Best with red solo cup.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Stone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These inflated better than the fruit ones... but all worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Gargiulo

customer_reviews.title: These are so fun and a standard sized can floated nicely
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun and a standard sized can floated nicely. The skinnier can did not float well until I put a koozie on it before putting in the doughnut.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: They do a good job of holding up your beverages
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a last minute party favor for a friend's pool party and they were a hit! They do a good job of holding up your beverages, as long as it isn't over-sized or top heavy. They also arrived with time to spare so I'm a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S.

customer_reviews.title: cute and fun!
customer_reviews.text: ....saw these in palm springs and had to have them. they're so cute and kitschy! unfortunately, could not find them in any of the hotels or souvenir shops in palm springs. amazon, as always, saved the day. i bought these because i love the variety. they can be used for more than just a drink floatie! i used mine to put a small plant in. would also be very cute to hold soap in your shower!

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed! Opened the package and one of them had a hole.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Clever little holders I got for a friend. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Fun as a toy
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, I don't know how these are as drink floats since I got these for my toddler to play with in her inflatable pool. She likes to mimic taking the bite and it's fun for floating small toys. I would prefer the air nozzle be on the bottom instead of the top.
customer_reviews.author: VFlower2011

customer_reviews.title: So Great, I Need More!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute item. Exactly as described. I cannot wait to use them!
customer_reviews.author: outofvogue

customer_reviews.title: They look great but are hard to blow up and keep air ...
customer_reviews.text: They look great but are hard to blow up and keep air in. They tend to top over if not actively being watched but they were a fun touch for a pool party.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Works great for keg cups or shorter
customer_reviews.text: Works great for keg cups or shorter...taller glasses will tip over. But they were a blast on our vacation and worked great in the hotel pool.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Olson

product_meta.title: BigMouth Inc. Inflatable Bird Pool Cupholder Floats, 3-pack includes Pink Flamingo and Black and White Swans , Multi-Colour
feature_bullets: Bird Beverage Floats will add a little tropical scenery to your pool
These unique beverage floats feature three aquatic birds that include a pink flamingo, a white swan and a black swan and will keep your drink afloat while you relax in the pool
Bird Beverage Floats are a must-have for your next pool party
Package of 3 Made of durable vinyl Holds standard size cups Each measures 7" in diameter To clean rinse in lukewarm water and air dryCups are not included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars246 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
